summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing financial matters. Epstein mentions a significant loss in his investments and communicates confidential information. The email highlights the relationship between Epstein and Staley, who is identified as an executive at J.P. Morgan.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

persons.name: Jes Staley

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein mentions a loss of 6 million in investments.
The email contains confidential information and may be attorney-client privileged.
Jes Staley is identified as an executive at J.P. Morgan.
The correspondence indicates a close professional relationship between Epstein and Staley.
